title: Butterfly - BTS
lyrics: tone gốc: C# Capo ngăn 6 chơi neon amu maldo kkeonaejido ma (Yeah) geunyang naege useojwo i modeun ge da kkumin geot gata (Yeah) sarajiryeo hajima Is it true? Is it true? You You neomu areumdawo duryeowo Untrue Untrue You You You naege yaksokhaejullae son daemyeon naragalkka buseojilkka geobna geobna geobna i sungani jinamyeon eobseotdeon iri doelkka geobna geobna geobna Butterfly, like a Butterfly machi Butterfly, bu butterfly cheoreom Butterfly, like a butterfly machi Butterfly, bu butterfly cheoreom meolliseo humchyeobwa i chilheuk gateun ni jageun sonjit han beone salposi pyoryuhaneun meonji gata neon geogi itjiman waenji dahji anha stop kkum gateun neon naege butterfly, high Untrue Untrue You You You naege yaksokhaejullae son daemyeon naragalkka buseojilkka geobna geobna geobna i sungani jinamyeon eobseotdeon iri doelkka geobna geobna geobna naui haebyeonui kapeukayeo nae maeumeun ajik neo wie buseojyeo (nan geunyang idaero jeungbalhago sipeo) naege yaksokhaejullae son daemyeon naragalkka buseojilkka geobna geobna geobna i sungani jinamyeon eobseotdeon iri doelkka geobna geobna geobna Butterfly, like a Butterfly machi Butterfly, bu butterfly cheoreom Butterfly, like a butterfly machi Butterfly, bu butterfly cheoreom
